html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-07032020-09-30,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectTaxpayers’ Ombudsperson - Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue
PrecisOrder (1) changing the English version of the name by which the special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, who may be appointed by the Governor in Council under paragraph 127.1(1)(c) of the Public Service Employment Act, is to be known to the Taxpayers’ Ombudsperson; and (2) replacing the schedule to Order in Council P.C. 2007-828 of May 24, 2007, as amended by Orders in Council P.C. 2007-1117 of June 29, 2007 and P.C. 2011-33 of February 1, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Taxpayers’ Ombudsperson - Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue
precis: Order (1) changing the English version of the name by which the special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, who may be appointed by the Governor in Council under paragraph 127.1(1)(c) of the Public Service Employment Act, is to be known to the Taxpayers’ Ombudsperson; and (2) replacing the schedule to Order in Council P.C. 2007-828 of May 24, 2007, as amended by Orders in Council P.C. 2007-1117 of June 29, 2007 and P.C. 2011-33 of February 1, 2011.
